name: Wish of Burial Beyond the Light

levels.description:
All other ally units within Attack Range gain <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</> equal to <@ba.vup>{atk:0%}</> of this unit's ATK and DEF. The healing effect of this unit's Trait is increased to <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</>
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
